subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Kasey Kahne, who won Nascar’s longest race for his first win with Hendrick Motorsports, ran away from the field in the final 100 laps after Greg Biffle had led for more than 200.
snippet: Kasey Kahne, who won Nascar’s longest race for his first win with Hendrick Motorsports, ran away from the field in the final 100 laps after Greg Biffle had led for more than 200.
